```{r setup}
#library(PGLMM)
library(tidyverse)
# Load data
tortoise <- read.csv(here("gopher_tortoise.csv"))

#histrogram 
plot_year <- tortoise %>%
  mutate(z = as.factor(year)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = prev,y=shells)) +
  geom_histogram((aes(fill = z)),binwidth=3)+
  geom_density(color = "red", size = 1)
#plot_year


plot_site <- tortoise %>%
  mutate(z = as.factor(year)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Site,y=shells)) +
  geom_histogram((aes(fill = z)),binwidth=10)+
  geom_density(alpha=0.6)
#plot_site
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
# boxplot
box_year <- ggplot(tortoise, aes(x=as.factor(year), y=shells)) + 
  geom_boxplot()+
  xlab("Year")+
  ylab("number of shells")
```
